summary: Carrying lots of gold, feeling a little uncomfortable when you're around Riften? Can't trust your spouse or housecarl either? Visit one of the banks in the holds of Skyrim to safely store your gold!
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Banks of Skyrim[/size]
Have you ever wondered why there are no banks in Skyrim where you can safely store and protect your gold from all the thieves, pickpocket-happy people, Guards using the good ol' arrow in the knee tactic to steal your gold, and beggars all across Skyrim? Well, those times are over now!

Banks of Skyrim adds a bank (from scratch created buildings) at each Hold with more features being added as I learn to do more with the Creation Kit.

Each building is in the style of the hold it's settled, so you won't see a Whiterun-themed building in Solitude for lore-friendliness. :)

[b]Current features:[/b]
- Walk into one of the buildings and safely store your gold.
- Lore friendly design buildings so they don't look silly.
- A vault with a huge amount of Gold that's heavily guarded. (Exact numbers? Try figuring it out yourself ^^)
- Unique objects only found in this mod!
- More as time goes by...



[b] PLEASE NOTE [/b]
If you are using any mod that alters anything around the holds, it will conflict with the design.

For example, if you're using True Skyrim, you may see a tree sticking out, or other odd looking things.
author: Franceska
